snippet: After high winds forced officials to suspend play again at the Tournament of Champions, golfers were scheduled to play 36 holes Monday and 18 on Tuesday.
abstract: Officials suspend play for second time at Kapalua Tournament of Champions because of high winds; even before persistent gusts pushed finish of season-opening event back a day, schedule was major talking point for the players; tour is shifting its calendar, which means that the 2014 season will start in October, less than month after 2013 season ends with Tour Championship.
lead_paragraph: After high winds forced officials to suspend play again at the Tournament of Champions, golfers were scheduled to play 36 holes Monday and 18 on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Gusts Overshadow Tournament of Champions, and, for the Moment, a Putter Debate
headline.main: Gusts Overshadow Tournament and, for the Moment, a Putter Debate
headline.print_headline: Gusts Overshadow Tournament and, for the Moment, a Putter Debate
